definitions.body: order, row, [[בְּגָדִים]] ´[[ע]] Ju Jdg 17:10 a (complete) suit of clothes (laid out in order), LXX: B stolh\n i(mari/n; [[לֶחֶם]] ´[[ע]] Ex 40:23 i.e. loaves arranged in a row, so ´[[ע]] alone v:Ex 40:4 (P); [[עֶרְכּוֹ]] Job 41:4 his symmetry (v. [[חִין]] sub [[חנן]]).

estimate, valuation, made by ordering, classifying: [[אִישׁ]] [[כְּעֶרְכּוֹ]] 2Ki 23:35; in 2Ki 12:5 read [[עֵרֶךְ]] (for MT [[עוֹנֵּר]]) money of a man's valuation LXX Benz Kit, and prob. del. [[כֶּסֶף נַפְשׁוֹת עֶרְכּוֹ]] (? ´[[עֶרֶח נ]] ´[[כ]] Kit) as gloss (sta:ZAW v (1885), 288 f.); [[כְּעֶרְכִּי]] Ps 55:14 a man acc. to my valuation, fig. for my equal; elsewhere P, of priest's valuation of trespass-offering Le 5:15, Le 5:18, Le 6:6, vows, and redemption-money Le 27:2, Le 27:3, Le 27:3, Le 27:4 + 17 t. 27 ([[כֶּסֶף עֶרְכְְּ]] v.Le 27:15, v:Le 27:19, [[מִכְסַת הָעֶרְכְְּ]] v:Le 27:23 [del. [[ךְָ]]], cf. v:Le 27:23 b [del. id.]), Nu 18:16.—Job 28:13 read [[דַּרְכָּהּ]] LXX Di al.
